/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red brick, their warm tones contrasting with the cool blue of the sky above. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, softening the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
